title: Excellenta fresh pasta in Venice, Italy.
text: We found this place watching a video in youtube . No regrets on visiting them. Very fresh and tasty food . Very good pasta for the price.
place: Dal Moro's Fresh Pasta to Go

title: PIZZA IN ROMA
text:
Wraps, calzzoni, pizza, lasagna, you name it . Fresh and tasty.
Just a short distance from Colosseum . You will not regret.

title: Top place to visit in Athens
text: A lot of history to remember from high school ancient history . You can walk through the areas some people problably walked 2000 plus years ago. Amazing!...

title: Wonderful local restaurant bar in Athenas
text: Restaurant close to Acropoli.Excellent food , Excellent price . They have few Greek selections and the House wine was awesome.

title: Excellent location , breakfast and accomodations.
text: If you want to have a few days visiting Old Town Istanbul , you cannot miss staying at this hotel. They good breakfast and located at walking distance to a lot of sites ,including easy access to the Ferry dock and metro stations .

title: No need to look for another place to have Dinner in la Havana as a local
text: This restaurant has a variety of excellent food at a very reasonable price. We were three people with an smile in the face when we left and forgot the very little time of waiting. Restaurant is located not close to Old Havana but it is worth to take the trip . hidden gem ! ( Not for the locals) .

title: Very good Breakfast at reasonable price.
text: In our last day in la Havana , we just found this cafe that serves a very good breakfast and at reasonable price. They have some options and the coffee is real good . You will not regret . I would probably had breakfast every day if I knew its existence from arrival .

title: Excellent food at wonderful price
text: Found this restaurant for lunch with coworkers at lunch time . Very good food . You will be happy with the quality of the food and the price . They serve American and Latin plates.

title: Food for every taste
text: Excellent food, always fresh . Tried different plates and always enjoyed the food . Leave space for cheese cakes , you will not regret.

title: Modern breakfast
text: You will find breakfast menu very different to the usual . I had the Elvis , my family ordered different from each other . Well all (7 people ) are thinking on coming back before leaving Halifax. 10 points!

title: Weekend special
text: Summer , best time because of the water slides but you can enjoy a weekend day any time of the year with family or friends. There are walking and bike roads. There are some tents you could even celebrate birthday parties .

title: Excellent resort to stay in Playa del Carmen
text: Although it was raining all days when staying at resort , all the other amenities made us forget about the beach . I cannot imagine if it does not rain. They a big beach side and a lots of pools . Nothing to say about the food , if you are in all inclusive get ready to do a diet after finishing your vacations .

title: GREAT ALTERNATIVE WHEN GOING TO CHICAGO.
text: I w as looking for hotel in Chicago downtown but i couldn't find anyone that fit on my budget. I was looking for alternatives for some days until if found this hotel. When booking hotel I was a little hesitant as I was thinking I was paying to much for a hotel but the hotel proof me wrong. The price was right for what we received; Excellent breakfast(Comparable to a 5 STAR HOTEL), spacious and very clean room (It gave me an idea for my next bedroom, pool (Clean and tempered, made me stay and not leave the hotel for a complete day) and the most important THE STAFF( Friendly and trying to help at all times, special thanks to shuttle driver, He gave us a lot of tourism info).I forgot to mention hotel has free shuttle to O'Hare airport and train station.IF COMING BACK TO CHICAGO IN THE FUTURE I WOULD DEFINITELY STAY IN THIS HOTEL.

title: Vacationing like a king
text:
We vacationed different times in the past and we love all inclusive resorts and this was one of the best experiences we ever had.
What was good? Every thing, the rooms cleaned every day, the food ok ( We couldn't ask more for what we paid, The Rodizio restaurant was the best). We stayed in a room with view to the beach and the pools . I could see every morning maintenance guys cleaning the pool. To all the staff and entertainers, Great job!.

We definitely will be back in the future.

Travel considerations;
We came from Fort Lauderdale with Spirit Airlines , good price if you buy ahead of time, the only issue but not a problem the flight arrives in Santiago de Los caballeros which is 1 hour from airport. We paid 80 dollars for a cab. We used the same one to come back. As per the resort we booked through Expedia ,real good price for 6 nights. Book ahead also you can find good prices,we heard about Group on from some guests.

We feel we really had vacation!
